transcript_chunks.text: mike can you guess how many seeds there are for you to find in this game uh [ __ ] it's a thousand actually isn't it right it's like something's more than that it's like 900 yeah 900 [ __ ] and jabroni's run around and get that yeah and then you know what the prize is more inventory slots or yeah no no or like kevin ruin it let's do it you get a golden [ __ ] what a golden piece of poo i'm not even joking you get a gilded [ __ ] what reason for what reason i i mean i think poke fun yeah it's an insult like doesn't it isn't there like you think so that's just a slap in the face of nintendo and being like yo this beloved franchise i don't think you waste your entire life finding these little seeds for this man's maraca now i'm gonna slap you in the face with some doo doo
